item.description:
Hi everyone,

I found a supposedly great laser tag place in West Roxbury (Caroline suggested West Roxbury due to the convenience of getting there by the the T).

Here is the website if anyone wants to check it out: http://www.laserquest...

The telephone number and address is: Laser Quest West Roxbury
(617)325-1005
1580 VFW Parkway,
West Roxbury, MA
02132-5500

(Just past the Dedham mall)

The price should be $9pp which is a great deal from what I have seen. It is for about 25 - 30 minutes.

I don't think that it has a restaurant in it but we can definitely get dinner somewhere around there. I can find something but I am certainly open to suggestions - just throw 'em out! :-)

Oh, I am also open to suggestions on the time. I figure if we get there at 6pm, get all laser-ed up at 6:15pm - play till 6:45pm, get out of there by 7pm and off to dinner and drinks we go!

Hope to see some of you there!
item.name: Laser tag!
